item.title: Report E-2024010400
item.description:
Report E-2024010400

Identified by scraper @ 2024-01-24T15:11:38+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-16
  • City: ELLENWOOD
  • State: GA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: On January 16, 2024, one (1) one-gallon pail of UN1824 was punctured by a faulty skid and released approximately one half (0.5) cup of product to the dock floor. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from Hull's Environmental Services (HES) to remediate the impacted site. Crews utilized a neutralizing solution and absorbent pads to wipe down the other freight and dock floor. All undamaged freight was restacked and rewrapped for further shipment and processing. One (1) 55-gallon drum that contained the one (1) damaged 5-gallon jug and absorbent pads was labeled and staged in the terminal's waste holding room
